TopicTitle: Kerbol Con Starts Today at 11 AM EST on KSP-TV!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bitly.com/1315vDE"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/4de0217e9acd97d3412d075b386956bd/tumblr_inline_nfnxqz9ZKZ1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span><strong>Kerbol Con</strong>, the unofficial <strong>KerbalKon</strong>, starts today at <strong>11:30 AM EST</strong> on <a href="http://bitly.com/1315vDE"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a>! Join many of your favorite KSP-TV hosts, media team members and special guests for a day of launches, laughs and explosions, all in celebration of the best gaming community around today! Join the fun <a href="http://bitly.com/1315vDE"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</span></p>
Yeeha, can't wait to see what the streamers planned there!
